metadata.title: USN-5745-1 -- shadow vulnerability
metadata.description: Florian Weimer discovered that shadow was not properly copying and removing user directory trees, which could lead to a race condition. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to setup a symlink attack and alter or remove directories without authorization.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5745-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  passwd - 1:4.11.1+dfsg1-2ubuntu1.1 login - 1:4.11.1+dfsg1-2ubuntu1.1 libsubid4 - 1:4.11.1+dfsg1-2ubuntu1.1 libsubid-dev - 1:4.11.1+dfsg1-2ubuntu1.1 uidmap - 1:4.11.1+dfsg1-2ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
